short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Injects your Amazon affiliate tag into the URL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop missing out on referral earnings. This simple but powerful extension inserts your affiliate IDs on Amazon automatically.

How it works:
- Add your referral ID in the extension options
- Shop on Amazon as normal
- The extension detects when you surf on Amazon and injects your affiliate ID.
That's it! The referral IDs are added seamlessly in the background.

Key Features:
- Supports all Amazon domains of each country
- Simple setup - just add your ID
- Lightweight extension won't slow browsing
- Open source project on GitHub (https://github.com/simwai/referral-link-inserter)

Take control of your passive income. Install the Amazon Affiliate Tag Injector extension now and start earning commissions from your referrals! 

If it helped you out, you can donate me here: https://simwai.taplink.ws
